articles.author: Csongor Körömi
articles.title: South Africa’s president hits back at Trump and Musk over land law - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Cyril Ramaphosa defends measures that allow the state to seize land without compensation, after the U.S. president accused South Africa of treating “certain classes of people VERY BADLY.”
articles.content: In his own post, Ramaphosa argued the Expropriation Act was designed to implement land reform in the public interest and address economic and racial inequality dating back to South Africa’s apartheid… [+566 chars]
